mapper.sql: ID, ICON, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, NUMBER, RANK, PARENT, EXPERIENCE, MONEY, STRENGTHEN, HONOR, ADDSUCESS, GIFT, AMOUNT, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, STATUS, DEFAULTOPEN, OPENMODULE, BACK_UP
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_GROWTH_MISSION where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or TITLE like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_GROWTH_MISSION (ID, ICON, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, NUMBER, RANK, PARENT, EXPERIENCE, MONEY, STRENGTHEN, HONOR, ADDSUCESS, GIFT, AMOUNT, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, STATUS, DEFAULTOPEN, OPENMODULE, BACK_UP) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{experience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strengthen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{honor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addsucess,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{defaultopen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{openmodule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
